overview: Jaber works as a stuntman in the cinema, and his brother Helbawy and Karima run the Regisser office for films and celebrations.  Sultan Al-Sharnoubi meets Jaber at a wedding, and contracts with Jaber to star in a movie that he will produce and direct.  We discover that the entire movie is a major hoax, and just a front for his illegal business;  Where he tricks him into carrying out a bank robbery as part of the filming.
title: The Thief and the Fox
